meanings.sent1: Tripoli is a beautiful city with rich history.
meanings.sent2: I dream of visiting Tripoli one day.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken cross the road in Tripoli? To explore the ancient ruins!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the lights of Tripoli at night.
meanings.sent5: The bustling markets of Tripoli are a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: A type of fine-grained rock used for polishing.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler used tripoli to polish the gemstone.
meanings.sent2: Tripoli is known for its effectiveness in bringing out the shine.
meanings.sent3: Why did the rock go to the party? To show off its tripoli polish!
meanings.sent4: His smile was as bright as a freshly polished tripoli surface.
meanings.sent5: The tripoli gently smoothed out the imperfections in the metal.
